summary: THE SMALL/ROUND MIRRORS MOUNTED ON SIDE-VIEW MIRRORS.  MR  WHICH WERE LOCATED ON THE PASSENGER SIDE REAR VIEW MIRRORS WERE ILLEGAL ON PASSENGER VEHICLES.  THE CONSUMER STATED THAT IF REMOVED FROM HIS VEHICLE, HE WILL BECOME HANDICAPPED, AND RELIES ON THESE MIRRORS TO CHANGE LANES.  THE CONSUMER REQUESTED NHTSA MAKE THESE MIRRORS LEGAL FOR PASSENGER VEHICLES, EDUCATE AND INTRODUCE THESE MIRRORS TO THE PUBLIC, AND NOTIFY ALL ENFORCEMENT AGENCIES TO RELAX THE ILLEGALITY OF THESE MIRRORS IMMEDIATELY UNTIL LEGISLATION APPROVING BECOMES FINAL.  SCC  Z*JB
